drinks.name: Exotic Milk
drinks.description: Chocolate milk tea mixed with a hint of cacao. Organic milk from Pitton-Milk with the topping of our own grass jelly.

drinks.name: Chocolate Lover
drinks.description: Green milk tea mixed with real cacao blended together with organic milk from Pitton-Milk. A truly chocolate milk for chocolate lover.

drinks.name: Milky Milky
drinks.description: Caramel milk tea blended with our in house speacial organic milk. A drink toppped with honeyboba and egg pudding.

drinks.name: Matcha Lover
drinks.description: Green milk tea spinned with a hint peppermint milk. A refreshing milk tea topped with egg pudding and honeyboba.

drinks.name: Purple Taro
drinks.description: Taro milk drink blended with real taro. Organic milk drink from Pitton-Milk and toppped with shedded taro.

drinks.name: Sea Salt Sweet Tooth
drinks.description: Sea Salt creamy foam that spike up your day. Toppped with a little salt and babies chocolate.

drinks.name: Mars Comer
drinks.description: The tittle said it all... Super caramel milk drink topped with rainbow boba and rainbow jelly.

drinks.name: Alien
drinks.description: Feeling down?? Alien will make your day. Our day to day special.
